LanguageData.ArchoGacha_minJackpotOffsetTooltip:
The absolute minimum value Ultra-Rare prizes will try to generate to.
Overriden by individual banners if their specified minimum prize value is higher.

Default: 500

LanguageData.ArchoGacha_jackpotChanceTooltip: The chance of pulling an ultra-rare reward\n\nDefault: 0.006
LanguageData.ArchoGacha_pullPriceFactorTooltip: The price multiplier to the cost of pulling on banners compared to the real cost of the item. Higher is more realistic.\n\nDefault: 1.25
